name: Mazinger Z for PlayStation 2
description:
Mazinger Z for PlayStation 2

It is an amazing adventure in which you must pilot the robot Mazinger Z, to face the evil robots of doctor hell, which tries to dominate the world. You will fly through many parts of the planet destroying enemies.

Game for the Sony PlayStation 2 console. It is possible to play it on a real PS2 console that has modchip or Free MCBOOT. It can also be played with the PCSX2 emulator. You can download it from the itch.io store and you can study its source code with the book "Programming for PlayStation 2: for Dummies" written by Rolando Fernández Benavidez, distributed on Google Play Books.
